name: Morton Antivirus
description:
Uh oh! 

Your computer is FULL of bugs that are trying to overheat your motherboard! 

Stop those pesky fire-flies using the trusty "Morton Antivirus™!" This program will guarantee to exterminate any invading bugs while keeping your system cool, clean, and charged. 

Watch the program use its top-of-the-line trusty bug zapper and frost-sprayer to defend all of your immaculate internals!

Try "Morton Antivirus™" today at the low, low cost of 0 payments of $19.99!

[Batteries not included]

Controls:

  • WASD to move Morton around the motherboard
  • M1 to fire your zapper at bugs
    • Knocks around enemies and other game objects
  • M2 to fire frost at overheating pipes to cool them
    • Or to vacuum plugs and batteries to their receptacles

Credits:

  • Lex: Main programming
  • Connor: Programming/Music/Sound
  • Joey: Visuals

External Resources:

  • MAD Hacker Font by Darrell Flood
  • Kenney particle assets
